title: What are some short-lived TV series from the '70s, '80s and '90s that aged poorly after only one season? - Quora

response.answer_text: Several ill-fated but briefly defunct classic TV shows, among them The Adventures of Brisco County JR., Sports Night and I’ll Fly Away, were popular with viewers way back in the early 1990s.  But that was not too close to call, when some classic TV flops had trouble finding audiences much as any new series must work out of the small-screen megahits of the 1970s and 1980s.
